name: Shadow Enchantment, Greater
book: Pathfinder Campaign Setting: Occult Realms © 2015, Paizo Inc.
text: This spell functions like shadow enchantment, except that it enables you to create partially real, illusory versions of psychic, sorcerer, or wizard enchantment spells of 5th level or lower. If the spell is recognized as a greater shadow enchantment, it's only three-fifths (60%) as effective.
name_zh: 高等幽影幻惑/高等幽影惑控
text_zh: 此法术效果如同幽影幻惑，除了它能让你创造异能者、术士或法师5环(含)以下惑控法术的部分真实、虚幻的版本。如果认出此法术，其效果为变为原来的五分之三(60%)。
